title: Calories in Pozole
meta_description: Learn calories in pozole per cup serving, including carbs from hominy, protein from pork, fat breakdown, and sodium info for this hearty Mexican soup.
assumptions: Homemade pork pozole with hominy, pork shoulder, onions, garlic, chili, and broth; no toppings like radishes or lime.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, meat type, portion size, and added ingredients; check labels for canned or restaurant versions.

quick_answer.text: One cup of pork pozole has about 250 kcal, with 15 g protein and 20 g carbs mainly from hominy.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged soups.

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of pozole?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal per cup of traditional pork pozole.
Yes, around 800 mg per cup due to broth and seasonings.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in pozole?
faqs.a: Roughly 15 g per cup, mostly from the meat.

faqs.q: Does pozole have a lot of carbs?
faqs.a: About 20 g per cup, primarily from hominy corn.

faqs.q: How does chicken pozole compare calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Lower fat version has ~220 kcal per cup versus pork.
